archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0168
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to optionally have to give approval before any chargeable micropuchases are charged to my card, so that I can control my spend

properties.value: A preference setting in self service (not per each use of additionally paid service). There will be a couple of possible states that can trigger additional communication to the customer.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
